name: Angeles National Forest
description: Steep terrain with dense chaparral (dry, woody shrubland common in SoCal) and high wind exposure.

name: San Bernardino Mountains
description: Mountain communities surrounded by dry forest/chaparral (dense shrubland).

name: Malibu & Santa Monica Mountains
description: Coastal canyons with dense chaparral (dry shrubland) and intense WUI exposure.

name: Ventura County Hills
description: Dry hillsides flanking agricultural valleys; chaparral (dry shrubland) fuels.

name: Riverside/Corona Foothills
description: Rapidly growing WUI at canyon mouths; chaparral (dry shrubland).

name: Orange County Foothills
description: Narrow canyons with chaparral (dry shrubland) close to homes.

name: San Diego Backcountry
description: Hot, dry backcountry with chaparral (dry shrubland) and limited access.

name: Inland Empire - San Jacinto
description: Mountain/desert interface; chaparral (dry shrubland) and limited water.
